Package pgui.btn

Class RadioButtonGroup

java.lang.Object
pgui.type.Element
pgui.btn.RadioButtonGroup
public class RadioButtonGroup extends Element
A collection of multiple RadioButton objects, intrinsically linked together. Only one button in the group can be selected at any given time.

  • Field Summary
